text:
Liliane Juchli (19 October 1933 – 30 November 2020) was a Swiss nurse and writer. She was a member of the Merciful Sisters of the Holy Cross. She was the main author of an important German-language nursing textbook which was called "the Juchli". She was born in Obersiggenthal, Switzerland.
Juchli died in Bern, Switzerland from COVID-19 on 30 November 2020 at the age of 87.

annotations.surface_form: Merciful Sisters of the Holy Cross
